channel.title: Two click death
channel.description: Whenever i try to play my server i can log in and do whatever i want... As long as i do it in two clicks... after that the client shuts down and the run.bat has some crazy log thing... i've googled multiple times and still nothing has helped. if anyone has had this problem and fixed please help me! Oh and i'm running Win7 wich i'm sure has something to do with it... And before i restored my comp i did have it running on this computer sos... i know it can be done

item.title: Two click death
item.dc:creator: @Pkman411 Pkman411
item.description:
@Pkman411 wrote:

Whenever i try to play my server i can log in and do whatever i want… As long as i do it in two clicks… after that the client shuts down and the run.bat has some crazy log thing… i’ve googled multiple times and still nothing has helped. if anyone has had this problem and fixed please help me! Oh and i’m running Win7 wich i’m sure has something to do with it… And before i restored my comp i did have it running on this computer sos… i know it can be done
